newsitem.title: UK: Eidos back in black, share price jumps.
newsitem.headline: Eidos back in black, share price jumps.

text.p: Software development firm Eidos Plc reported an improved pre-tax profit of 7.8 million stg for the third quarter to December, 1996 compared with a 1.0 million stg loss in the same period in the previous year.
The company's earning per share for the period under review stood at 54p against a loss of 15 pence.
Eidos' share price rose 70 pence to 1,040 at 0831 GMT after it announced its results.
The group's turnover rose to 32.1 million stg from 1.2 million.
The company said some key corporate and publishing deals had helped it improve its performance.
The company recently raised $18 million through issue of American Depositary Receipts and is now listed on the Nasdaq.
The group's nine-month turnover to December 1996 rose to 53 million stg with pretax profit at 3.1 million stg against a loss of 1.4 million.
